data.title: Titles
authors: Contributors to Sea of Thieves Wiki
data.meta_description: Titles are Vanity items that are earned through a player's progress and accomplishments. A Title can be equipped to be displayed above the player's head, below their Gamertag. Every new player will start with the Sailor title, while other Titles are earned through a variety of methods...
data.text:
Titles Details Type Vanity Location Vanity Chest

Titles are Vanity items that are earned through a player's progress and accomplishments. A Title can be equipped to be displayed above the player's head, below their Gamertag.

Every new player will start with the Sailor title, while other Titles are earned through a variety of methods: Promotions at Trading Companies, completing Commendations or Event challenges, and during Seasons by reaching specific Renown Levels. Titles from Company Promotions must first be purchased from a General Clothing Shop before they appear in Vanity Chest. Most other Titles become immediately available in the Vanity Chest.

Starter Title[]

Image Title Description & Requirements Sailor "For those who don't believe in titles or those who have yet to get a decent one."

(Unlocked by default.)

Trading Company Titles[]

These Titles are earned by completing Gold Hoarders related tasks & Commendations.

Promotion Titles are earned by purchasing the associated promotion unlocked at the Reputation Levels noted below.

Commendation Titles[]

These Titles are all unlocked by completing the related Gold Hoarders Commendations of the same name to its top Grade.

Image Title Description & Requirements Golden Voyager Complete 250 Gold Hoarders voyages. Keeper of a Glittering Hoard Earn 150,000 gold with the Gold Hoarders. Sailor of the Gold Horizon Sail 1000 nautical miles on Gold Hoarder voyages. Seeker of Lost Maps Purchase 250 Gold Hoarder voyages. Hoarder of the Castaway's Gold Sell 90 Castaway's chests to the Gold Hoarders. Hoarder of the Seafarer's Gold Sell 180 Seafarer's chests to the Gold Hoarders. Hoarder of the Marauder's Gold Sell 270 Marauder's chests to the Gold Hoarders. Hoarder of the Captain's Gold Sell 360 Captain's chests to the Gold Hoarders. Hoarder of Grog Soaked Gold Sell 100 Chests of a Thousand Grogs to the Gold Hoarders. Hoarder of Treasured Tears Sell 100 Chests of Sorrow to the Gold Hoarders. Hoarder of Barnacled Gold Sell 300 Shipwrecked Chests to the Gold Hoarders. Hoarder of Lost Artefacts Sell 450 Treasure Artefacts to the Gold Hoarders. Hoarder of Ancient Tributes Return 50 Chests of Ancient Tributes to the Gold Hoarders. Seeker of Ancient Vaults Open 100 Gold Hoarders Treasure Vaults with a Vault Key.

Sailor of the Whispering Bones Sail 1000 nautical miles on Order of Souls bounties. Seeker of Lost Souls Purchase 250 Bounty voyages. Hunter of Foul Skulls Deliver 70 Foul Bounty Skulls to the Order of Souls. Hunter of Disgraced Skulls Deliver 180 Disgraced Bounty Skulls to the Order of Souls. Hunter of Hateful Skulls Deliver 270 Hateful Bounty Skulls to the Order of Souls. Hunter of Villainous Skulls Deliver 360 Villainous Bounty Skulls to the Order of Souls. Hunter of Cursed Crews Defeat 180 Skeleton Crews. Hunter of Cursed Captains Defeat 1000 Skeleton Captains. Raider of Cursed Strongholds Clear 120 Skeleton Forts. Hunter of Fort Skulls Deliver 60 Skeleton Fort Skulls to the Order of Souls. Scourge of the Damned Defeat 500 Ghost Ships. Banisher of the Spectral Flame Defeat the Burning Blade 10 times.

Merchant Shipwright Deliver 50 Wood Crates on schedule. Cast Iron Merchant Deliver 50 Cannonball Crates on schedule. Black Powder Merchant Deliver 100 Gunpowder Kegs on schedule. Merchant of the Dawn Caller Deliver 200 Chickens on schedule. Merchant of the Wild Hog Deliver 200 Pigs on schedule. Merchant of the Serpent's Scale Deliver 200 Snakes on schedule. Merchant of Grand Fauna Deliver 200 Golden Animals on Schedule. Merchant of the Silken Trade Deliver 200 Crates of Luxurious Cloth on time and in perfect condition. Merchant of Forsaken Flora Deliver 200 Crates of Devil's Plants on time and in perfect condition. Merchant of Forsaken Rum Deliver 200 Crates of Devil's Rum on time and in perfect condition. Athena's Fortune[]

These Titles are earned by completing Athena's Fortune related tasks & Commendations, many of which requiring the Pirate Legend Title.

Pirate Legend[]

Image Title Description & Requirements Pirate Legend "A pirate of the highest repute, a status deserving hearty salute!"

Reach Level 50 in any three Trading Companies.

Unlocks Pirate Legend exclusive Athena's Fortune Commendations to be performed, and Pirate Legend exclusive cosmetic items to be earned or purchased.

Must be obtained from the Mysterious Stranger before appearing in the Vanity Chest.

Promotion Titles[]

Promotion Titles are earned by purchasing the associated promotion unlocked at the Reputation Levels noted below.

Image Title Reputation Level Guardian of Athena's Fortune

10

Champion of Athena's Fortune

20

Vanguard of Athena's Fortune

30

Commendation Titles[]

These Titles are all unlocked by completing the related Athena's Fortune Commendations of the same name to its top Grade.

Image Title Description & Requirements Seeker of Athena's Fortune Purchase 100 Athena's Fortune voyages. Sailor of Athena's Fortune Sail 1000 nautical miles on Athena's Fortune voyages. Athena's Voyager Complete 30 Athena's Fortune voyages. Legendary Treasure Hunter Sell 30 Chest of Legends to the Mysterious Stranger. Legendary Thief Sell 5 Chest of Legends to the Mysterious Stranger that were stolen. Hoarder of Athena's Fortune Earn 300,000 Gold from Chests of Legends. Legend of Black Powder Sell 100 Stronghold Gunpowder Barrels as a Pirate Legend. Golden Legend of the Strongholds Sell 100 Stronghold Chests as a Pirate Legend. Mystical Legend of the Strongholds Sell 100 Stronghold Skulls as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Merchant of Bone Sell 100 Crates of Ancient Bone Dust as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Gold Hoarder Sell 500 Chests as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Merchant of Fauna Deliver 500 Animals on time, as a Pirate Legend. Legend of the Mystical Order Sell 500 Bounty Skulls as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Merchant Trader Deliver 500 Cargo Crates on time and in perfect condition, as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Hunter of The Hungering One Defeat The Hungering One 50 times as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Hunter of The Crested Queen Defeat The Crested Queen 50 times as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Hunter of The Shadowmaw Defeat The Shadowmaw 50 times as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Hunter of The Ancient Terror Defeat The Ancient Terror 50 times as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Hunter of the Shrouded Ghost Defeat The Shrouded Ghost 5 times as a Pirate Legend. Legend of The Sea of Thieves Defeat 500 Skeleton Ships as a Pirate Legend. Legendary Sea Dog Place first in an Arena Contest 240 times as a Pirate Legend.

Time-limited Legend of the Deep Deliver 50 fish as a Pirate Legend. Collector of Legendary Chalices Deliver 50 Chalices of Ancient Fortune as a Pirate Legend. Collector of Legendary Relics Deliver 50 Gilded Relics of Ancient Fortune as a Pirate Legend. Collector of Legendary Skulls Deliver 50 Skulls of Ancient Fortune as a Pirate Legend. Collector of Legendary Villainous Skulls Deliver 50 Villainous Skulls of Ancient Fortune as a Pirate Legend. Collector of Legendary Voyages Deliver 50 Crates of Legendary Voyages as a Pirate Legend. Collector of Legendary Black Powder Deliver 50 Kegs of Ancient Black Powder as a Pirate Legend.

Sea Dogs[]

These Titles are earned by completing Sea Dogs related tasks & Commendations.

Note: Due to the Removal of The Arena, these titles are no longer able to be acquired unless you previously met the requirements for them.

Promotion Titles[]

Promotion Titles are earned by purchasing the associated promotion unlocked at the Reputation Levels noted below.

Image Title Reputation Level Arena Pup

5

Arena Mutt

10

Arena Terrier

15

Arena Fox

20

Arena Hound

30

40

Commendation Titles[]

These Titles are all unlocked by completing the related Sea Dogs Commendations of the same name to its top Grade.

Image Title Description & Requirements Sharpshooting Sea Dog Kill 200 players with a pistol in The Arena.

Time-limited Swashbuckling Sea Dog Kill 200 players with a cutlass in The Arena.

Time-limited Deadeye Sea Dog Kill 200 players with the Eye of Reach in The Arena.

Time-limited High Calibre Sea Dog Kill 200 players with a blunderbuss in The Arena.

Time-limited Iron Sea Dog Kill 200 players with cannons in The Arena.

Time-limited Master of Arms Kill 200 players in The Arena.

Time-limited Seeker of Silvered Loot Dig up 100 chests in The Arena.

Time-limited Treacherous Sea Dog Deliver 50 stolen chests in The Arena.

Time-limited Keeper of Silvered Loot Earn 300,000 Silver in The Arena.

Time-limited Sailor of Silvered Waters Complete 200 Contests in The Arena.

Time-limited Captain of Silvered Waters Place in the top three in 100 Contests in The Arena.

Time-limited Master of Silvered Waters Place first in 100 Contests in The Arena.

Time-limited Glorious Sea Dog Win a contest when you own all of the Glorious Sea Dog Clothing, Vanity Items, Equipment Items, Weapons and Ship Parts.

Time-limited Triumphant Sea Dog Win a contest when you own all of the Triumphant Sea Dog Clothing, Vanity Items, Equipment Items, Weapons and Ship Parts.

Emissary of Eternal Keepers Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Keeper Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the first time. Master of Eternal Emissaries Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the first time. Servant of Splintered Ships Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Servant Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the second time. Keeper of Splintered Ships Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Keeper Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the second time. Master of Splintered Ships Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the second time. Servant of Taken Treasures Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Servant Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the third time. Keeper of Taken Treasures Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Keeper Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the third time. Master of Taken Treasures Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the third time. Servant of Fearless Freedom Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Servant Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the fourth time. Keeper of Fearless Freedom Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Keeper Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the fourth time. Master of Fearless Freedom Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the fourth time. Servant of Masked Mystique Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Servant Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the fifth time. Keeper of Masked Mystique Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Keeper Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the fifth time. Master of Masked Mystique Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the fifth time. Servant of Fiery Fates Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Servant Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the sixth time. Keeper of Fiery Fates Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Keeper Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the sixth time. Master of Fiery Fates Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the sixth time. Servant of Soulflame Schemes Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Servant Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the seventh time. Keeper of Soulflame Schemes Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Keeper Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the seventh time. Master of Soulflame Schemes Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the seventh time. Servant of Cursed Chalices Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Servant Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the eighth time. Keeper of Cursed Chalices Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Keeper Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the eighth time. Master of Cursed Chalices Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the eighth time. Servant of Brokered Bounties Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Servant Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the ninth time. Keeper of Brokered Bounties Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Keeper Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the ninth time. Master of Brokered Bounties Represent the Reaper's Bones in the Master Tier at the closure of an Emissary Ledger for the ninth time.

These Titles are earned by completing Tall Tales related tasks & Commendations.

Image Title Description & Requirements Sailor of the Shores of Gold Complete all Shores of Gold Tall Tale Commendations. Maiden Voyager "After braving the journey through the shroud you have reached the Sea of Thieves!"

Rewarded for the completion of the Maiden Voyage.

Event Titles[]

Summer of Sea of Thieves[]

These Titles were available to earn from Summer of Sea of Thieves (Summer 2020).

Image Title Description & Requirements Pirate Dandy "As a pirate with personality, you've met famous figures from across the Sea of Thieves."

Complete all goals under the Meet the Locals challenge.

Time-limited Pirate Mingler "You certainly know how to make friends and influence pirates."

Complete all goals under the Make New Friends! challenge.

Time-limited Shipshape Pirate "You keep your body and your ship in tip-top condition!"

Complete all goals under the Stay Healthy challenge.

Time-limited Seasoned Pirate "You've seen and done it all, from your Maiden Voyage to braving The Arena."

Complete all goals under the Experience More challenge.

Time-limited Mischief Maker "You're no stranger to dangerous stunts on the seas."

Complete all goals under the Spread Mischief challenge.

Time-limited Pirate Menace "You're too wild to be left alone for 10 minutes."

Complete all goals under the Go Wild challenge.

Time-limited People Pirate "You're known for bringing groups of pirates together."

Complete all goals under the Play Together challenge.

Time-limited Drunken Sailor "You're never far from a grog, especially counting the 10 already inside you."

Complete all goals under the Get Groggy challenge.

Time-limited Dashing Daredevil "You never shy away from a daring challenge, no matter the risks!"

Complete all goals under the Be More Daring challenge.

Time-limited Prizewinning Pirate "You earn so many trophies and prizes that you'll soon win one for Biggest Head!"

Complete all goals under the Win a Trophy challenge.

Time-limited Legend of the Sun "Your legendary antics outshone all others during a memorable summer of fun and games."

Complete all goals under the Reignite the Legend challenge.

Time-limited

Fate of the Damned[]

These Titles were available to earn from Fate of the Damned Event (October 2020).

Image Title Description & Requirements Fated Slayer of Wild Shores Completed all Goals in the Fate of the Wild Shores Challenge.

Time-limited Fated Slayer of Ancient Sands Completed all Goals in the Fate of the Ancient Sands Challenge.

Time-limited Fated Slayer of Raging Skies Completed all Goals in the Fate of the Roaring Skies Challenge.

Time-limited Fated Slayer of Wide Renown Completed all Goals in the Defeat the Damned! Challenge.

Time-limited Fated Slayer of Dauntless Fury Defeat 400 Shadows of Fate during the Fate of the Damned event.

Time-limited Supreme Fated Slayer Completed all of the Weekly Challenges in the Fate of the Damned event.

Time-limited

12 Deeds of Giving[]

This Titles were available to earn from 12 Deeds of Giving (December 2020).

Image Title Description & Requirements Master of Festivities Completed all of the Goals in the 12 Deeds of Giving Challenge.

Time-limited

Image Title Description & Requirements Champion of Souls "A title awarded to those pirates who prove they're devoted to the destruction of the damned."

Collecting 500 Soul Fragments during Champions of Souls.

Other Titles[]

Creator Crew Titles[]

These Titles are earned by completing Creator Crew related tasks & Commendations.

Image Title Description & Requirements Tale Whisperer "Youve been sharing your tales for a while now and youre becoming famous! Or maybe infamous"

Be signed up to the Creator Crew programme, and stream for 20 hours.

('Tale Whisperer' Grade V Commendation). Pirate Storyteller "Pirates come from far and wide to follow your story, crowding the seas to witness your deeds!"

Be signed up to the Creator Crew programme, and have 20 concurrent viewers.

('Pirate Storyteller' Grade III Commendation). Seeker of Tales "You love to follow the daring deeds of renowned pirates, knowing their legends better than your own!"

Be signed up to the Creator Crew programme, and accumulate 100 hours watch time.

('Seeker of Tales' Grade II Commendation).

Rare Ltd Titles[]

Image Title Description & Requirements Rare Crew "Pirate aboard the good ship Rare"

Rare employee.

Comes paired with exclusive Rare Crew Sails. Rare Legend "Legend aboard the good ship Rare"

Rare employees who have obtained Pirate Legend status. Treasured Deckhand "Our eyes and ears out on the sea, your dedication to the pirate community is highly treasured."

To be a community member appointed as Community Moderator on one of Sea of Thieves' official social platforms.

Comes paired with exclusive Deckhand Sails. Quartermaster "A Title awarded to those proud few who tirelessly uphold the Pirate Code, bringing peace and order to the waves."

Awarded to members of the Sea of Thieves Official Community Moderator Team.

Comes paired with exclusive Quartermaster Sails.

Promotional Titles[]

Image Title Description & Requirements Brave Vanguard "Amongst the first to embark on a pirate's life, you showed great bravery sailing into the unknown."

Awarded to players who were granted Founders status by joining the Insider Programme before December 1, 2017.

Comes paired with Vanguard Sails.

Time-limited Ratcatcher "No rats escape your stomping boots - you always take the battle to them!"

Complete Act 1 in the 2020 release of Battletoads before March 26, 2021.

Time-limited

SoTShot[]

Awarded for winning #SoTShot, a regular screenshot competition held through the official Sea of Thieves Twitter and Instagram accounts.

Image Title Description & Requirements Noteworthy Artist of the Seas Awarded for creating artistic masterpieces that were shared with other pirates. (2 wins) Accomplished Artist of the Seas Awarded for creating artistic masterpieces that were shared with other pirates. (3 wins) Renowned Artist of the Seas Awarded for creating artistic masterpieces that were shared with other pirates. (5 wins) Inspiring Artist of the Seas Awarded for creating artistic masterpieces that were shared with other pirates. (7 wins) Visionary Artist of the Seas Awarded for creating artistic masterpieces that were shared with other pirates. (10 wins)

Other[]

Image Title Description & Requirements Boatswain "A prestigious title awarded to those who help keep the Sea of Thieves a fun, fair and fortune-filled pirate paradise."

Created to celebrate the Pirates who are positive members of community, who are fairminded but respectful of the Pirate Code and Forum Rules!

Time-limited Shark Slayer Defeated the Hungering One.

Time-limited

Image Title Description & Requirements Hero of Thrones Earned by sitting in all the smaller Skeleton Thrones. Master of Thrones Earned by sitting in all the Skeleton Thrones.

Image Title Description & Requirements Skeleton Exploder Earn the following Commendations: Skeleton Exploder, Plant Skeleton Exploder, Gold Skeleton Exploder, Shadow Skeleton Exploder. Master Skeleton Exploder Earn all non-Legendary Gunpowder Skeleton Commendations. Legendary Skeleton Exploder Earn all Legendary Gunpowder Skeletons Commendations.

The Sunken Curse[]

Image Title Description & Requirements Curse Breaker Earned the Curse Breaker Commendations. Master Curse Breaker Earned all Master Curse Breaker Commendations. Legendary Curse Breaker Earned all Legendary Curse Breaker Commendations.

Image Title Description & Requirements Protector of The Wilds Earn 'Protector of the Wilds' Commendation.

Time-limited Protector of The Shores of Plenty Earn 'Protector of The Shores of Plenty' Commendation.

Time-limited Protector of The Ancient Isles Earn 'Protector of The Ancient Isles' Commendation.

Time-limited Seeker of the Warsmith Earn 'Seeker of the Warsmith' Commendation.

The Cursed Crews[]

Main article: Cursed Crews

Image Title Description & Requirements Legend of Cursed Iron Earn 'Legend of the Cursed Iron' and all of the Commendations for killing Skeletons with Cursed Cannonballs. Bearer of the Reaper's Mark Earn all of the Cursed Cannonball Commendations against ships while flying the Reapers Mark. Legendary Cursed Voyager Earn the 'Legendary Cursed Voyager' Commendation.

Forsaken Shores[]

Main article: Forsaken Shores

Image Title Description & Requirements Devil's Cartographer Discover all islands in the Devil's Roar. Master Devil's Voyager Complete all 'Devil's Voyager' Commendations. Master Cargo Runner Deliver 100 pieces of cargo on time and in prime condition. Legendary Cargo Runner Deliver 200 pieces of cargo on time and in prime condition.

Festival of the Damned[]

Main article: Festival of the Damned

Image Title Description & Requirements Legend of The Damned Unlock 'Legend of the Damned' Commendation.

Shrouded Spoils[]

Main article: Shrouded Spoils

Image Title Description & Requirements Master Kraken Hunter Defeat 5 Kraken.

('Master Kraken Hunter' Commendation.) Legendary Kraken Hunter Defeat 10 Kraken.

( 'Legendary Kraken Hunter' Commendation.) Hunter of The Hungering One Defeat the Hungering One.

('Hunter of The Hungering One' Commendation.) Hunter of The Crested Queen Defeat the Crested Queen.

('Hunter of The Crested Queen' Commendation.) Hunter of The Shadowmaw Defeat the Shadowmaw.

('Hunter of The Shadowmaw' Commendation.) Hunter of The Ancient Terror Defeat the Ancient Terror

('Hunter of The Ancient Terror Commendation.) Hunter of The Shrouded Ghost Defeat the Shrouded Ghost

('Hunter of The Shrouded Ghost' Commendation.) Master of Stronghold Spoils Unlock the following Commendations: Master of Black Powder, Golden Master of Strongholds, 'Mystical Master of Strongholds', Master of Ancient Bone Dust. Golden Skeleton Captain Unlock Unlock 'Golden Skeleton Captain' Commendation. Mystical Skeleton Captain Unlock Unlock 'Mystical Skeleton Captain' Commendation. Hoarder of Mermaid Treasure Unlock the following Commendations: Hoarder of Sapphire Mermaid Gems, Hoarder of Emerald Mermaid Gems, Hoarder of Ruby Mermaid Gems.

Fort of the Damned[]

Image Title Description & Requirements Raider of the Damned Clear the Fort of the Damned of all enemies, 50 times.

('Conquering the Damned' Commendation).
